vendor/clear.py
Last Update: 2020-03-30 15:11:55 -0700

#!/usr/bin/python # -*- coding:utf-8 -*- import sys import os

# The path to the gem library, passed in from ruby gpath = sys.argv

# Compose the path to the support library for the eink screen libdir = gpath + “/waveshare_epd”

# Add it to the path if os.path.exists(libdir):

sys.path.append(libdir)

import logging

from waveshare_epd import epd2in7 import time from PIL import Image,ImageDraw,ImageFont import traceback

# Initialize the screen epd = epd2in7.EPD() epd.init()

# Clear it epd.Clear(0xFF)

# Power down display epd.sleep()

exit()
